SEARCH:
程序包 Entity

类 TaskList

java.lang.Object
Entity.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
The TaskList class represents a list of tasks and provides various methods to manage the tasks.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    TaskList()
    Constructs a new TaskList with an empty list of tasks.

  • 方法概要

      public TaskList()
      Constructs a new TaskList with an empty list of tasks.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task task)
      Adds a new task to the task list.
      参数:
      task - the task to be added

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask(Task task)
      Removes a task from the task list.
      参数:
      task - the task to be removed

    • getTask

      public Task getTask(int index)
      Returns the task at the specified index.
      参数:
      index - the index of the task to be returned
      返回:
      the task at the specified index

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(String taskName, Task newTaskData)
      Updates the task with the specified name with new task data.
      参数:
      taskName - the name of the task to be updated
      newTaskData - the new task data to update

    • getNonConfirmedTask

      public TaskList getNonConfirmedTask()
      Returns a TaskList of tasks that are not confirmed.
      返回:
      a TaskList of tasks that are not confirmed

    • changeDepository

      public TaskList changeDepository(String destination)
      Changes the destination of all tasks in the task list.
      参数:
      destination - the new destination to be set for all tasks
      返回:
      the TaskList after changing the destination

    • getAllTasks

      public List<Task> getAllTasks()
      Returns a list of all tasks in the task list.
      返回:
      a list of all tasks in the task list

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of tasks in the task list.
      返回:
      the number of tasks in the task list

    • getTaskByName

      public Task getTaskByName(String name)
      Returns the task with the specified name.
      参数:
      name - the name of the task to be returned
      返回:
      the task with the specified name, or null if no task with the name exists

    • checkDuplicateName

      public boolean checkDuplicateName(String name)
      Checks if there is a duplicate task name in the task list.
      参数:
      name - the name of the task to be checked
      返回:
      true if there is no duplicate task name, false otherwise

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex(String name)
      Returns the index of the task with the specified name.
      参数:
      name - the name of the task
      返回:
      the index of the task with the specified name, or -10 if no task with the name exists

    • descriptionSet

      public String descriptionSet(String description)
      Formats a description into an HTML string with line breaks.
      参数:
      description - the description to be formatted
      返回:
      the formatted HTML string
